text: A contribution may consist of tangible or intangible property or other benefit to a limited liability company, including money, services performed, promissory notes, other agreements to contribute money or property, and contracts for services to be performed.
historical:

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

Uniform Law:

This section is based on ยง 402 of the Uniform Limited Company Act (2006 Act). See Vol. 6B , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

subchapter.text: Relations of Members to Each Other and to Limited Liability Company.
